bot.license:
ğŸ¤– Welcome to the Trading Bot!
âš ï¸ WARNING: Automated trading on cryptocurrency exchanges involves high risks. There is a possibility of complete loss of your deposit.
ğŸ“Œ By using this bot, you: - Fully understand the risks associated with futures trading; - Confirm that you are solely responsible for your actions and any losses incurred; - Agree that the bot owner is not liable for any financial losses.
ğŸ“£ HOW TO CREATE API KEYS ON BITGET \ BITUNIX ğŸ” *Secure your account. Enter keys step by step.*
---
1ï¸âƒ£ Go to API Management ğŸ‘‰ Bitget\BitUnix â†’ Profile â†’ API Management â†’ [+ Create API]
---
2ï¸âƒ£ Configure Access - Name: TradingBot - âœ… Trade (enabled) - âœ… Read (enabled) - âŒ Withdrawal â€” DISABLED! - âŒ API Management â€” DISABLED!
> ğŸ” Security: Withdrawal permission must be disabled.
---
3ï¸âƒ£ Copy the three values Immediately after creation, copy:
API Key (public key) Secret Key (private key) Passphrase (only required for Bitget exchange)
âš ï¸ This is the only time you will see these credentials!
---
4ï¸âƒ£ Enter them into the bot one by one The bot will ask for each item separately:
1. Enter your public key (API Key): â†’ Paste only the API Key
2. Enter your secret key (Secret Key): â†’ Paste only the Secret Key
3. Enter your passphrase: â†’ Paste only the Passphrase (required only for Bitget)
ğŸ“© Please reply to each message from the bot individually.
---
ğŸ”’ Your keys are secure
- All keys are encrypted (AES-256) immediately upon entry. - The administration cannot see your keys in plain text. - Only encrypted data is stored in the database.
Example: BEFORE encryption: x1y2z3... AFTER encryption: a9b8c7d6...
---
ğŸ›¡ Tips - ğŸ” Change your API keys every 3 months. - ğŸš« Never share your keys with anyone. - ğŸ”„ If you lose access, delete the old API and create a new one.
ğŸ“£ Important! Before Getting Started
To connect to the bot, you must:
1. âœ… Register via my referral link on one of the exchanges: Bitget ğŸ‘‰ https://partner.bitget.com/bg/W58MTR BitUnix ğŸ‘‰ https://www.bitunix.com/register?vipCode=zwdn
2. ğŸ” Enter the partner code: 3zkl (Bitget) zwdn (BitUnix) (if not applied automatically, enter it manually)
3. ğŸ§¾ Complete account verification (KYC) â€” required only for Bitget. Not required for BitUnix.
4. ğŸ’µ Make your first deposit
ğŸ”¹ The bot will verify: UID + referral code + account activity
âŒ If any of the above steps are incomplete, access will be denied.
